verses.verse: (For the choir director; [set to] Al-tashheth. A Mikhtam of David, when he fled) (from Saul, in the cave.) Be gracious <S%H2603><s%> to me, O God, <S%H430><s%> be gracious <S%H2603><s%> to me, For my soul <S%H5315><s%> takes <S%H2620><s%> refuge <S%H2620><s%> in Thee; And in the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of Thy wings <S%H3671><s%> I will take <S%H2620><s%> refuge, <S%H2620><s%> Until <S%H5704><s%> destruction <S%H1942><s%> passes <S%H5674><s%> by.
I will cry <S%H7121><s%> to God <S%H430><s%> Most <S%H9411><s%> High, <S%H9411><s%> To God <S%H410><s%> who accomplishes <S%H1584><s%> [all things] for me.

He will send <S%H7971><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%> and save <S%H3467><s%> me; He reproaches <S%H2778><s%> him who tramples <S%H9575><s%> upon me. Selah. <S%H5542><s%> God <S%H430><s%> will send <S%H7971><s%> forth His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> and His truth. <S%H571><s%>

My soul <S%H5315><s%> is among <S%H8432><s%> lions; <S%H9225><s%> I must lie <S%H7901><s%> among those who breathe <S%H3857><s%> forth <S%H3857><s%> fire, <S%H3857><s%> [Even] the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men, <S%H120><s%> whose teeth <S%H8127><s%> are spears <S%H2595><s%> and arrows, <S%H2671><s%> And their tongue <S%H3956><s%> a sharp <S%H2299><s%> sword. <S%H2719><s%>
Be exalted <S%H7311><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> O God; <S%H430><s%> [Let] Thy glory <S%H9202><s%> [be] above <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

They have prepared <S%H3559><s%> a net <S%H7568><s%> for my steps; <S%H6471><s%> My soul <S%H5315><s%> is bowed <S%H3721><s%> down; <S%H3721><s%> They dug <S%H3738><s%> a pit <S%H7882><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me; They [themselves] have fallen <S%H5307><s%> into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of it. Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

My heart <S%H3820><s%> is steadfast, <S%H3559><s%> O God, <S%H430><s%> my heart <S%H3820><s%> is steadfast; <S%H3559><s%> I will sing, <S%H7891><s%> yes, I will sing <S%H2167><s%> praises! <S%H2167><s%>
Awake, <S%H5782><s%> my glory; <S%H9202><s%> Awake, <S%H5782><s%> harp <S%H5035><s%> and lyre, <S%H3658><s%> I will awaken <S%H5782><s%> the dawn! <S%H7837><s%>
I will give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to Thee, O Lord, <S%H136><s%> among the peoples; <S%H5971><s%> I will sing <S%H2167><s%> praises <S%H2167><s%> to Thee among the nations. <S%H3816><s%>
For Thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is great <S%H1419><s%> to the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> And Thy truth <S%H571><s%> to the clouds. <S%H7834><s%>
Be exalted <S%H7311><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> O God; <S%H430><s%> [Let] Thy glory <S%H9202><s%> [be] above <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>
